DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study explore effect online facilitate discussion group engagement stress management intervention deliver employee UK via Internet . The investigator primary hypothesis intervention group access online facilitate discussion group ( deliver via message board ) show great engagement intervention group access discussion group . The investigator also hypothesise participant intervention group improve significantly psychological distress subjective wellbeing measure compare wait list control group , group access online facilitate discussion group show great improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Engagement With Online Stress Management Interventions
DOC.detailed_description: The aim pilot study identify address challenge deliver online psychological intervention workplace . There clear research evidence delivery online psychological intervention within clinical setting ( e.g . Andersson & Cuijpers , 2009 ) , evidence translate online intervention deliver work setting ( e.g . Geraedts , Kleiboer , Twisk , Wiezer , van Mechelen , & Cuijpers , 2014 ) . Evidence suggest one barrier efficacy online intervention may low level engagement adherence ( Cavanagh & Millings , 2013 ) . This study aim address ask question : `` How increase engagement adherence online intervention deliver workplace ? '' The pilot study three-arm RCT compare minimal guide online Cognitive Behaviour Therapy ( CBT ) base stress management intervention ( WorkGuru ) deliver without online facilitate bulletin board , wait list control . Both active condition access online programme minimal support coach . The discussion group condition also access facilitate online bulletin board . Up 90 employee UK base organisation recruit study . Inclusion criterion include age 18 , elevate level stress ( define 1SD mean norm PSS-10 scale ) , access computer tablet , Internet . The primary outcome measure engagement , define number logins site ; secondary outcome measure include measure engagement ( number page visit , number module complete self-report engagement ) measure effectiveness ( psychological distress subjective wellbeing ) . Possible moderator include measure intervention quality ( satisfaction , acceptability , credibility , system usability ) , time pressure , goal conflict , level distress baseline , job autonomy . Measures take baseline , 2 week ( credibility expectancy measure ) , 9 week ( completion intervention ) 16 week ( follow-up ) . Analyses conduct intention treat per protocol principle . Data collect electronically use Qualtrics survey software .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 Employed participate organisation , â‰¥ 20 Perceived Stress Scale Access computer/table internet
